item.title: The cheapest and most affordable hosting in 2020 - Also amongst the best
item.description: When purchasing a web hosting server for the first time (year), you do not have to think much; as most hosting providers offer hefty discounts on the first year subscription or first few years of subscriptions. Every hosting provider claims to be offering the most affordable hosting plans with huge discounts applied to the normal pricing. But when it comes to renewing your hosting server, you are often out again in search of another budget hosting plan.
